text: okay if you watched our stuffed piquillo

adaptable as I'll explain later but here
we go here's the basic four ingredients
I have some roasted almonds these are

Spanish olive oil 1 clove of garlic in

curly much more flavorful and just I
like it a lot better by the way here's a

you have hold your knife at like a 45
degree angle a sharp knife by the way
and just kind of shave the leaves right
off the stem of that parsley it's still
all bunched up that's a really easy way

be careful because they're still in the

but once you could have started and once

through so you don't have nuts flying

fairly fine all right now what we're

this is gonna actually be a saucer

so you kiss for what I'm using this with
which is going to be that the key Oh
peppers I want it to be in more of a

flowing sauce so that is what I went
with
and again very versatile any green herb
almost basil spinach arugula almost any
nut will work now depending on what

now again this is not a sauce you're
